text: A high-vibration anomaly was detected on CNC-01 exceeding safe thresholds.
Coolant pressure dropped suddenly on CNC-02, triggering an overheating alarm.
CNC-03 stopped unexpectedly due to loss of sensor feedback.
Axis deviation was detected on CNC-04 during precision milling.
Power instability caused CNC-05 to reboot during operation.
Lubrication pressure fell below minimum operating levels on CNC-06.
Tool change failed repeatedly on CNC-07 due to mechanical obstruction.
CNC-08 exceeded thermal limits during extended operation.
Controller configuration mismatch caused startup failure on CNC-09.
Unusual mechanical noise was detected from CNC-10 drive system.
